Write-Up Text: Australian social media circulated various hot topics on this Federal Budget season. People eagerly shared insights predictions and opinions on upcoming policies. Posts by esteemed professors and economists assessed the budget policies revealing how these policies can widen the income gap between the rich and poor. Other posts discuss the impact of the budget on unemployment and the education sector. A few posts also uncovered the unusual and questionable clauses within the budget including payments to tax havens and the allocation of funds for White Pages Listings. Nevertheless some posts reveal potential win-win solutions for the government in achieving energy efficiency using renewable sources.
